metadata.name: IASO White Science EX Serum 0 02 g 1mL Liquid

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Levomenol has been known to elicit a number of potentially beneficial pharmacological effects including anti irritant anti inflammatory and anti microbial actions Bisabolol is also demonstrated to enhance the percutaneous absorption of certain molecules

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Levomenol is an anti inflammatory and natural moisturizing agent that has been found to diminish the signs of photodamage reduce pruritus and ameliorate skin texture and elasticity

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Levomenol can be increased when it is combined with Filgotinib
